1.0.name: wordpress/anti-spam
1.0.description:
Anti-spam | Donate

Anti-spam plugin blocks spam in comments automatically, invisibly for users and for admins.

  • no captcha, because spam is not users' problem
  • no moderation queues, because spam is not administrators' problem
  • no options, because it is great to forget about spam completely

Plugin is easy to use: just install it and it just works. Need more info about the plugin?

Useful plugins:

  • "Page-list" - show list of pages with shortcodes
  • "
